Looking for fast, mobile, accurate, and reliable metal analysis? At Bronneberg, we offer state-of-the-art SciAps Inc. Metall Analyzers that bring precision and portability together for superior performance in metal identification and sorting.
Explore our two leading models:

ğŸ”¹ XRF Analyzer X-200: The perfect solution for scrap metal sorting and positive material identification (PMI). With advanced X-ray fluorescence technology, it delivers rapid and precise results even on the most challenging materials.
ğŸ”¹ Laser Analyzer Z-70: Experience the power of laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy (LIBS) for fast alloy analysis. Ideal for high-speed sorting and accurate analysis of magnesium, aluminum, and other light elements.

With SciAps Analyzers, youâ€™ll save time, improve productivity, and boost profitability in your metal recycling operations.
ğŸ“© Contact us today for a demonstration or to find the right solution for your needs!

ğŸ“¢ Last week, the #REEPRODUCE consortium met at Bronneberg B.V. ğŸ‘ 

The consortium engaged in productive discussions around key objectives, strategies and next steps to ensure the success of our collaborative effortsğŸ¤

During the first half of the project, significant progress has been made in advancing recycling technologies for devices containing Neodymium (Nd) magnets. The #REEPRODUCE consortium initiated demonstration phases, focusing on validating innovative recycling processes across multiple facilities in Europe.Â At this stage the consortium has successfully constructed five pilots (TRL7) and carried out demonstration trials in two of them,Â marking a significant step forward in achieving the projectâ€™s objective.

The partners had the opportunity to visit Bronneberg B.V.'s facilities to explore the innovative pilots that FAU Erlangen-NÃ¼rnberg (Institute FAPS) and Bronneberg have developed to extract Nd-based magnets blocks from different components of selected end-of-life products, with validation planned for early 2025.

Exciting times ahead as we work together to drive innovation and deliver impactful resultsâ— â™»ï¸ğŸŒ

Donâ€™t miss outâ€”give us a follow and help spread the word ğŸ“¢

It was fantastic to see our Industrial Cutting Tools in action at Van der Ven Auto's , largest car recycler in the Netherlands, handling over 40,000 cars per year with a recycling rate of 98%.

Our Dutch partner for Industrial Cutting tools, Bronneberg B.V. ensures Van der Ven is equipped with the right tools, expert service, and reliable repairs. Partnership is a key factor in being successful in our markets. Our cooperation with Bronneberg is a perfect example of how to be successful by joining forces and knowledge. 

Are you curious to learn more about both our solutions for industrial recycling and cutting? Visit Alexander Jegerings, Ivo Willems and me next week at our joined booth during the Bureau of Middle East Recycling conference - 25 and 26 November - Le MÃ©ridien Dubai Hotel & Conference!

#holmatro #industrialcutting #wehelpmaketheworldmoveforward #recycling #demolition #production #decommissioning 
#hydraulics #hydrauliccutting #highpressurehydraulics #safe
